name: Tribute to Ac/Dc & Guns N' Roses by 2blue
about: Join us at Hard Rock Cafe for The Ultimate Tribute to AC/DC & Guns N’ Roses featuring the incredible 2Blue. With a powerful four-octave voice and captivating storytelling, Tirthankar Poddar brings nostalgia and energy to the stage. This is a must-see for anyone who grew up with classic rock—come and relive those unforgettable moments with someone special.

address.streetAddress: Unit G-25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall International Tech Park, Bangalore, Pattandur Agrahara

name: Tribute to Radiohead by Karma Police
about: Karma Police is back with an electrifying tribute to the legendary Radiohead. Experience an immersive audio-visual journey featuring fresh tracks and a deep dive into their nine studio albums, showcasing the band's genre-defying innovation and passion. Don't miss this captivating show!

name: Artbat Live in Delhi | Christmas Day
about: Join us for an unforgettable ARTBAT concert in New Delhi, featuring the dynamic duo from Kyiv, Artur and Batish. Renowned for their unique sound and impressive accolades, including Mixmag Stars of the Year and Beatport's Number 1 best-selling artists, this is a night you won't want to miss. Experience the energy and passion that has made ARTBAT a standout force in the electronic music scene.

name: THE GRIND #KORAMANGALA SOCIAL  | IEHPL
about: Experience the energy of 'The Grind', India's longest-running hip-hop event, coming to a city near you! Immerse yourself in the best hip-hop talent, rappers, dance crews, and streetwear pop-ups. Join the community and vibe to the tunes as you do THE GRIND.

name: AMNAP RECORDS & FRIENDS FT. DISCOSTAN(USA) + BAALTI(USA) + EBITDA + CARISSA
about: Join AMNAP Records & Friends for an electrifying night featuring Discostan and Baalti from the USA, along with EBITDA and Carissa. Get ready to dance to the best disco, bass, electro, and more all night long!

name: Tribute to Queen & Bon Jovi Ft. Moksha All Stars
about: Join us at Hard Rock Cafe, Whitefield for a spectacular Live Band Night featuring Moksha All Stars as they pay tribute to Queen and Bon Jovi. Experience their unique fusion of soulful melodies and high-energy performances that promise to create an unforgettable atmosphere. Bring your friends and get ready for a night of music that will resonate long after the last note.

address.streetAddress: Unit G-25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall International Tech Park, Bangalore, Pattandur Agrahara

name: Catharsis Vol. 05
about: Experience the vibrant energy of CATHARSIS - Vol. 5, Bangalore's premier gig series celebrating original music across diverse genres. From folk to metal, this festival showcases talented artists like Sharmila Joshi and Badal Kashyap, offering a unique opportunity to support the local music scene while enjoying an unforgettable night of creativity and passion.

name: Massano Live in Bangalore
about: Don't miss out on the electrifying performance by Massano Live in Bangalore! With a unique blend of aggressive sound design and hypnotic melodies, Massano has quickly become one of the biggest breakout stars in the music scene. From topping the Beatport charts to performing at renowned venues like Tomorrowland and Ultra, Massano's dynamic music is sure to leave you in awe.

name: Bangalore Death Fest Ft. Malevolent Creation (USA)
about: Get ready for the 2nd edition of Bangalore Death Fest presented by Extreme Underground India on December 15th, 2024. Witness the intense metal madness with performances by Malevolent Creation from the USA, Moral Putrefaction from Chennai, Obliterating Vortex, and Virodh. Don't miss out on this brutal lineup of death metal bands!

name: Glowal Live in Bangalore
about: Get ready, Bangalore! Glowal is set to light up WL Super Club on December 1st with their mesmerizing mix of hypnotic beats and melodic techno. Join us for an electrifying night filled with unforgettable energy and vibes that will kickstart your December in style!

address.streetAddress: 26, Haralur Main Rd, near HP Petrol Station, Amblipura, PWD Quarters, 1st Sector, HSR Layout

name: Korolova Live at Sunburn Union | Bangalore
about: Don't miss Krolova live at Sunburn Union Bengaluru on Saturday, 14th December! Hailing from Ukraine, Korolova is a breakout sensation in the melodic house and techno realms, with over 100 million YouTube views and 80 million audio streams. She has played on Tomorrowland’s mainstage and collaborated with premium record labels, captivating audiences worldwide with her melodious masterpieces.

name: Bunville Bollytech Saturday with Dj Roan
about: Get ready to turn up the heat with DJ Roan at Bunyville! Join us on November 30th in Kormangala for an exclusive event featuring Roan's electric sets and infectious beats. Doors open at 8 PM, so bring your energy and get ready for a night to remember with the best crowd and vibe in town!

name: I Built the Sky - Live in Bangalore
about: I Built The Sky, known for his electrifying performance at Pune NH7 Weekender 2023, is set to headline the Hills Festival in Meghalaya 2024. Don't miss his exclusive Bangalore debut at Fandom, Gilly’s Redefined on December 13th, featuring special guest YogiEatsProg, returning with a solo live show after seven years. Experience an unforgettable night of progressive music—tickets are available now!

name: The Night Belongs to You – a Tribute to Sleep Token
about: Join us for Dreamstate’s Sleep Token tribute gig, where fan-favourite tracks like "The Summoning" and "Take Me Back to Eden" come alive. Experience an immersive journey through haunting melodies and dark visuals, capturing the raw emotion of Sleep Token in a night that promises to be both otherworldly and deeply personal.

name: Echoes of Earth, 2024 - Bangalore
about: Experience the 7th Edition of Echoes of Earth, India's greenest festival, featuring over 300 International & Indian artists across multiple music genres. Engage in sustainability, conservation, and cultural experiences with solar-powered stages, art installations, workshops, and a curated flea market. Join the exclusive artist brunch for a chance to connect with your favorite performers. Get your tickets now for an unforgettable celebration with a larger message.

name: Blackstratblues Live | Bangalore
about: Join Blackstratblues for an unforgettable night of music, led by the talented Warren Mendonsa. Experience their unique blend of Blues, Rock, and 70's Psychedelia, featuring captivating melodies and electronic influences. With a history of sharing the stage with legends and chart-topping releases, this is a performance you won't want to miss.

name: Lollapalooza India 2025
about: Get ready, Mumbai! Lollapalooza India is back for its third edition on March 8-9, 2025. Featuring over 30 iconic artists across various genres like pop, rock, indie, hip-hop, and more, including headliners such as Green Day, Shawn Mendes, and Zedd. Join the ultimate music festival experience with amazing performances, food, beverages, and brand activations. Don't miss out on this two-day extravaganza celebrating live music and culture!

name: Ap Dhillon Live | the Brownprint | Delhi
about: Join the Punjabi music sensation AP Dhillon in Delhi for an electrifying live concert that promises to be a game-changer. Experience his latest EP, ‘The Brownprint,’ on a groundbreaking 360-degree stage that enhances audience interaction and intimacy. Get ready to groove to hits like ‘Brown Munde’ and ‘Excuses,’ alongside fresh tracks from his new release—this is one musical event you won't want to miss!

address.streetAddress: Indraprastha Estate, Grand Trunk Rd, near Raj Ghat, IG Indoor Stadium, ITO, IP Estate, New Delhi, Delhi 110002, India

name: Arijit Singh India Tour 2024 | Bengaluru
about: Get ready to experience the enchanting voice of Arijit Singh live in Bengaluru! This unforgettable concert promises a night filled with soulful melodies and electrifying energy as Arijit performs your favorite hits like "Apna Bana Le" and "Kesariya." Don’t miss this chance to witness the biggest production set of his career—grab your tickets now for a night that will leave lasting memories!
